ul.li: 2 rashers rindless bacon, cut into strips
2-3 tspoons each: soy sauce, chopped spring onion

ol.li: Heat half the oil in a frying pan
Add the eggs, swirl the pan to coat the base, then cook on low heat until set
Slide the omelette onto a plate and roll up. Cool a little then cut into 1cm rounds
Add the remaining oil to the pan. Cook the bacon until crisp. Place to one side
Stir in the rice and cook until it lightly browned
Add the soy sauce, spring onion and veges. Stir-fry until hot
Fold the bacon and egg strips reserving some for the top
Can to garnished with toasted cashew nuts

p.strong: Serves 2 as a meal or 4 as a snack, approximately time 15mins.
